course_description:
Jr/Sr Colloquium. 
This seminar will explore continuities and innovations between the medieval and modern blood libels, especially how the modern accusation was a product of post-Enlightenment politics, fears, and conventional social knowledge.
sections: Class Nbr: 2804, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 1-3:45p, Instructor: E. Schainker, Status: Open
